rdf:Description.dc:title: Doris McCarthy: Recent paintings
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Robert Vanderleelie Gallery
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Painting Canadian - 20th century - Exhibitions; McCarthy, Doris, 1910-2010 - Exhibitions
rdf:Description.dc:description:
Invitation to opening reception "Doris McCarthy: Recent paintings" at Robert Vanderleelie Gallery. Card contains image of painting "Pressure Ice in the late light, Broughton Island",1984.
Item in good condition.

rdf:Description.dc:title: Doris McCarthy: New Works
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Canadian Art Galleries
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Painting Canadian - 20th century - Exhibitions; McCarthy, Doris, 1910-2010 - Exhibitions
rdf:Description.dc:description:
Meet the artist announcement and exhibition "Doris McCarthy: New Works" at Canadian Art Galleries from 1992-04-11 to 1992-05-5. Announcement contains an image of the painting "Bishop's Harbour" 1991. Contains image "Bishop's Harbour,' oil on linen, 5' x 7', 1991.
Item in good condition.
